title: "Don't worry about the NRA": Trump
text:
"Don't worry about the NRA": Trump 6:25pm GMT - 01:09 
U.S. President Donald Trump on Monday told governors at the White House they should not be afraid to fight the National Rifle Association after a Florida attacker killed 17 people in one of the country's deadliest ever school shootings. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
